name: Trello theme: plain boxes
description: A simple theme for Trello, with plain blue colored boxes for cards. The top colored header (blue in the screenshot) is defined by the color of the board's background color, so is customizable. With commented css.
additional_info: To change the color of the header, just change the board's background color, by clicking on Show Menu > Change background. Updates August 2015: changed "add card" alignment, changed "add list" to be more subtle, added margin below header, etc. Updated screenshot.
